name: Amplified Kyr'Ozch Carbine
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Notum Amplification Coil drops in Alien Playfields and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Notum Amplification Coil" "257963" #L "Kyr'Ozch Carbine - Type 5" "254499" #L "Kyr'Ozch Carbine - Type 12" "254506" #L "Kyr'Ozch Carbine - Type 13" "254513" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Notum Amplification Coil + Kyr'Ozch Carbine - Type 5 = #L "Amplified Kyr'Ozch Carbine - Type 5" "257144" Skills: | 1250 CL | Note: The Carbine has to be QL250+ Notum Amplification Coil + Kyr'Ozch Carbine - Type 12 = #L "Amplified Kyr'Ozch Carbine - Type 12" "257143" Skills: | 1250 CL | Note: The Carbine has to be QL250+ Notum Amplification Coil + Kyr'Ozch Carbine - Type 13 = #L "Amplified Kyr'Ozch Carbine - Type 13" "257142" Skills: | 1250 CL | Note: The Carbine has to be QL250+
